org.jSyncManager.SJS.Adapters.SMTPServer
Class TestSMTPServer

java.lang.Object

      org.jSyncManager.SJS.API.AbstractAdapter
          org.jSyncManager.SJS.API.AbstractRequestResponseAdapter
              org.jSyncManager.SJS.Adapters.SMTPServer.AbstractSMTPServer
                  org.jSyncManager.SJS.Adapters.SMTPServer.TestSMTPServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SMTPMailTest, SMTPServerTest
public class TestSMTPServer
extends AbstractSMTPServer

Realization of the AbstractSmtpAdapter Handles all of the commands from the Smtp standard.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Jeff CROWE <jcrowe@uvic.ca>, Michael Walts <mwalts@uvic.ca>

getAddress

protected java.lang.String getAddress(java.lang.String address)
Detects source routes,and strips them off to return just the address Source routes are of the form &064;one,&064;two:joe@three.com Will also return quoted strings directly without param checking

Parameters:
address - address that may contain a source route, of the form "address>" (<address> with the first < taken off)
Returns:
the address that no longer contains a source route, null if the address is invalid
